price: Kuma da rãnar* da ake hũsa a cikin ƙaho, sai wandayake a cikin sammai da waɗanda suke a cikin ƙasa su firgita, fãce wanda Allah Ya so, kuma dukansu, su je Masa sunã ƙasƙantattu.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوۡهُ دَٰخِرِينَ
footnotes: * Bãyan fitõwar dabba, kuma sai bũsar ƙahõ na farkõ, sa'an nan na biyu sa'an nan Ƙiyãma.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fafaziʿa man fī al-samāwāti waman fī al-arḍi illā man shāa al-lahu wakullun atawhu dākhirīna
